I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

1. The cooling is very poor and inefficient. If you continue running the AC for more than 4 hours in Virat Mode, you won't be able to set the room temperature below 28 C.
2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

1. The cooling is very poor and inefficient. If you continue running the AC for more than 4 hours in Virat Mode, you won't be able to set the room temperature below 28 C.
2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.

I'm writing my review of LG 1.5-ton 3-star AC after using it for one month (In April which is not a peak hot time).

1. The cooling is very poor and inefficient. If you continue running the AC for more than 4 hours in Virat Mode, you won't be able to set the room temperature below 28 C.
2. Indoor unit size is small as compared to 1.5-ton ac of other brands so It doesn't circulate air in a wide area.
